name: EcoDistrict Pittsburgh
body:
## Welcome to EcoDistrict Pittsburgh
### Uptown Neighborhood Steering Committee

The Uptown EcoDistrict area consist of Uptown community members collaborating with the City of Pittsburgh and regional environmental groups, developers, and other commercial public/private endeavors to use public policy, planning, and civic development to seed and grow a [grow the global green neighborhood movement](http://ecodistricts.org/about/) and community lifestyle in the Uptown area of Pittsburgh, PA.

### Steering Committee 
The 2015 Steering Committee consists of self-elected and invited neighborhood business owners, residents, community organizations, City of Pittsburgh officials, and regional organizations vested in community-wide, long-term infrastructure planning and development.

#### Meeting Notes and Resources

2015 May 22 - at "Uptown Partners" office, 5th Avenue 9AM-4PM

### EcoDistrict Consultant Partners
The Uptown EcoDistrict project has retained a partnership with XYZ Consulting corporation. More about them here

### Authors and Contributors
Please contact Chris Field (@PittsburghChris) of Fort Pitt Web Shop for edits or contributions to this page.
2015, Pittsburgh, PA, USA.
